Articles.Content: Still crashes.
I honestly don't know then.

I don't think I'm able to test it. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif ";.;")

I was really looking forward to it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") But please respond if there are any performance fixes.
Say, did you open the GameData Folder that was downloaded and take each file into the KSP directory's GameData folder?

I just needed to delete a few planets I can handle atleast 2 planets and 1 mun

>

> 
> 
> Say, did you open the GameData Folder that was downloaded and take each file into the KSP directory's GameData folder?

Yes
Ok. Look through the files and check the configs.
Well I don't know Kopernicus.
Maybe we should summon [@Thomas P.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113164-thomas-p/) to help out with this issue.
I'm back to work! Now I just do a few planets and a few Mun's at a time
Oh, does it work?

[@Astrofox](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135785-astrofox/) [@Kandjk](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/156334-kandjk/) I'm already reading through the config files. Trust me, I'll get them to work.

> Oh, does it work?

I can only handle a few Mun's and a few planets at a time.
Ok, but that's good.

Yeah, better than not being able to test at all ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

Logs are the only thing that really helps to find the origin of issues, and I will happily help if you upload the correct logs for me (KSP.log and Logs/Kopernicus) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
[@Thomas P.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113164-thomas-p/) How do I find the Kopernicus log?

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, Kandjk said:
> 
> 
> [@Thomas P.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113164-thomas-p/) How do I find the Kopernicus log?
> 

I literally posted the paths...

[@Thomas P.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113164-thomas-p/) Don't bother. I've checked the configs, basically it's Plutonium-210 for Kopernicus. You're gonna find more issues in the logfiles than there are stars in the Sun's stellar neighborhood, therefore I'm rewriting the configs.

Oh, yeah... Sorry.

Didn't know "Logs" was a folder.

I've began my overhaul with the Mysterio system. The issues I found in Mysterio's config alone include unnecessary entries, entries that don't make sense and curves that'll make the game go berserk, along with a weird texture organization and OnDemandLoading getting thrown out the window. I've fixed all of that.
Okay. Er, you do know what your doing right?
